nodes.text: The Deflarian bunker was a bunker on the planet Corellia, near the city of Tyrena, used by the criminal organization known as the Deflarians during the time of the Galactic Civil War.

Circa 1 ABY, the Deflarians hijacked a ship piloted by Captain Donovan of the CorSec and stole its cargo of weapons. They then crashed a ship of the same model than Donovan's to cover the theft of the cargo. Donovan himself was captured and imprisoned in the Deflarian bunker. CorSec Inspector Cora hired a spacer to investigate the situation. The spacer managed to find the location of the bunker, infiltrated the building and found the imprisoned Captain Donovan. The spacer therefore killed Vinros, several Deflarian henchmen and a Deflarian underboss to liberate Donovan.

The Deflarian bunker appeared in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. The Deflarian bunker was added to the game with the release of the "Publish 28", on April 26, 2006.
